Item.Value: Hmm? I haven't seen you before, are you new? I'm $Character_3$. Charmed to meet you. Welcome to River Hollow, the town where nothing happens.
Hi $Name$. You know, seeing you running around is one of the few bright bright spots of this place. You're so driven, it's inspiring.
I'm not used to living on the outskirts like this. There's dirt everywhere. Do you have any idea how often I have to wash my robes to keep them clean? How do you handle it?
For me? Oh no, you shouldn't have!
How did you get this out here? I thought I would have needed to take a trip out of town to get this! Thank you so much!
Hey, $Name$, what do you need?{Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%Friend:50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Cancel}
Are you sure? I guess I can join you for an adventure today.
Sorry... I've got things to do today. Maybe later?
This town has it's quaint charm but... I miss the city. I can't wait until $Character_4$ and I have finished our business here.
I didn't think I'd see you today. I always jump at the opportunity to do nothing on rainy days. I guess you've got more on your plate than I do though, hm?
